text: ya misl un andhero ke hai jo nihaayath gehre samandar ki tay mein ho, jise upar ta le ki maujo ne dhaanp rakha ho, phir upar se baadal chaaye hoye ho, algharz andheriyaa hai, jo upar ta le pay dar pay hai, jab apna haath nikaale to us se bhi qareeb hai ke na dekh sa ke aur (baath ye hai ke) jise Allah taâ€™ala hee noor na de, us ke paas koyi roushni nahi hoti
